compliant.legal provisions: The collection of personal data must be lawful and fair.
Data subjects should be informed about the collection of their data.

compliant.section: 個人資料的收集與處理
compliant.legal provisions: The collection and processing of personal data must be based on the individual's consent or other lawful bases.
Personal data must be collected for specified, legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner incompatible with those purposes.
Users must be informed about the use of cookies and have the option to accept or decline them.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to access their personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Include a statement on how users can access their personal data.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to request deletion of their personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Add information on how users can request deletion of their data.

non_compliant.section: 個人資料的收集與處理
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers must implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.
non_compliant.amend: Include specific measures taken to protect personal data and ensure data security.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects should be informed about the retention period of their personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Add information regarding how long personal data will be retained.
